short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays 𝕏 (Twitter) followers count on any account's followers tab. (Bèta)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Did you ever want to know how many followers the people who follow you have? So you can quickly see who you should follow back and engage with? This 𝕏 Twitter extension does exactly that. It shows the amount of followers your followers have on the "followers" tab (Wow, how many times can you say followers in one sentence?)
